description:
These backcountry bindings feature a wide and stable platform for optimal control in ungroomed, off-track terrain. The rotation point is moved as far back as possible for better mobility and downhill performance.

  • SpringPin™ technology makes stepping in even easier
  • 36 mm heel lifter for greater comfort and efficiency going uphill
  • Compatible with skis down to 68mm underfoot
  • Compatible with XP and Xplore boots
name: Rottefella Xplore BC Offtrack Bindings - Unisex
